record.text:
Check out the paper --> epjdatascience.springeropen.com/articles/10....

Happy to chat about it!

external.description: High-resolution human settlement maps provide detailed delineations of where people live and are vital for scientific and practical purposes, such as rapid disaster response, allocation of humanitarian resources, and international development. The increased availability of high-resolution satellite imagery, combined with powerful techniques from machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI), has spurred the creation of a wealth of settlement datasets. The agreement and alignment between these datasets has not been studied in detail. We compare three settlement maps developed by Google (Open Buildings), Meta (High Resolution Population Density Maps) and Microsoft (Global Building Footprints), and uncover which factors drive mismatch. Our study focuses on 44 African countries. We build a global machine learning model to predict where datasets agree, and find that geographic and socio-economic factors considerably impact overlap. However, we also find there is great variability across countries, suggesting complex interactions between country morphology and dataset overlap. It is vital to understand the shortcomings of AI-derived settlement layers as international organizations, governments, and NGOs are already experimenting with incorporating these into programmatic work. We anticipate our work to be a starting point for more critical and detailed analyses of AI derived datasets for humanitarian, policy, and scientific purposes.
external.title: Uncovering large inconsistencies between machine learning derived gridded settlement datasets - EPJ Data Science

record.text:
ゲーム業界の決済戦略に迫る：Adyenが語る法改正とグローバル展開の未来 - AIゲームまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
Adyenは、アムステルダムに本社を置くグローバルなフィンテック企業で、ゲーム業界を含む多様な業界の企業に決済サービスを提供しています。佐野匠氏は、決済の重要性を強調し、顧客体験や売上向上を重視したアプローチを提供しています。Adyenの強みは、複数国での決済統合とオンライン・オフライン統合（ユニファイドコマース）にあります。特に、40契約を1つにまとめることができるため、グローバル展開する企業にとって非常に有益です。

また、2025年末に施行予定の「スマホソフトウェア競争促進法」により、ゲーム業界は直接決済を行うようになり、手数料削減やユーザーとの関係強化が可能になりますが、不正リスクや運営負担も増加します。佐野氏は、クロスボーダー取引や決済手段の多様化、承認率向上のためのAI活用技術についても言及し、AIはカード会社の「癖」を学習して承認率を向上させると述べています。
external.title: ゲーム業界の決済戦略に迫る：Adyenが語る法改正とグローバル展開の未来 - AIゲームまとめ

record.bridgyOriginalText:
Disruptive technologies ... disrupt by changing the way people do things.

And there are a lot of people who desperately want AI to be very disruptive.

But, I've never seen so much top-down pushing to try to make this happen.

Forcing people to use it at work. Adding it to applications.

If people wanted an AI word possessor they would stop using google docs to have it, and THEN those apps would be forced to add it.

We skipped that step.

You know... the one where it's organically popular.

external.title: Original post on sauropods.win

external.title: Original post on sauropods.win

record.bridgyOriginalText:
If AI was really the wonderful creative tool it's sold as people would line up to pay for it. You wouldn't need to push it, you wouldn't need to give it away to boost up the usage numbers.

Imagine if it could really make, say a video that was what you wanted. Not something that's kind of like what you wanted that gives you motion sickness, but work of a quality of a master animator working with you for a month to get it right.

But it can't deliver.

This is what I keep coming back to.

external.title: Original post on sauropods.win

record.bridgyOriginalText:
That said, I think this is a lot like when a celebrity runs a "charity auction" but you can only participate using the obscure crypto currency they are vested in.

It's a kind of pumping scam. Not enough people are using AI to make videos so here is a way to try to make people use AI to make videos. On "vibes" you have no choice.

The desperation propping up the bubble keeps becoming more and more visible.

AIデータセンター急拡大が、家庭の電気代を引き上げている--米調査 japan.cnet.com/article/3523...

"とりわけAIは、ChatGPTへの質問のような単純かつ膨大なリクエストも含め、データセンターに依存している。Microsoft、Meta、Google、AmazonといったAIに注力する企業は、エネルギー需要を賄うため、原子力を含む電源やデータセンターへの投資を拡大している。ChatGPTの開発元であるOpenAIは、テキサス州アビリーンで大規模データセンターを建設中で、先週、米国内にさらに5つの超大型拠点を新設する計画を明らかにした。"

external.description: LOS ANGELES/NEW DELHI: The clash between creativity and artificial intelligence is escalating across the entertainment world, as performers in Hollywood and Bollywood push back against the use of synthetic images and voices they say threaten their craft, reputations and livelihoods. In Los Angeles, the debut of an AI-generated "actress" named Tilly Norwood at a Zurich film industry conference has drawn swift condemnation from the SAG-AFTRA performers' union. Representing 160,000 actors, announcers and recording artists, the union denounced attempts to replace human performers with "synthetics," insisting that "creativity is, and should remain, human-centred."
external.title: Global showbiz battle with AI heats up | The Express Tribune

external.description: The UK government has issued a new order to Apple seeking access to encrypted iCloud backups of British citizens, according to a report from the Financial Times. The order, known as a “technical capability notice” (TCN), is the second demand the Home Office has sent to the company this year. The latest instruction reportedly narrows the scope of an earlier order, which sought access to the data of Apple users worldwide, including in the United States. That earlier attempt drew objections from Washington. US Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard called it a “clear and egregious violation of Americans’ privacy and civil liberties,” while President Donald Trump…

external.description: The source provides an extensive narrative about the 2002 murder of Alisson Alvarez at the Atlanta Motor Speedway during a car show. The episode recounts how the nineteen-year-old Colombian immigrant disappeared after going to the restroom and details the frantic four-day search that followed. The discovery of her body and the subsequent confession of Toby Dearing, a maintenance handyman who lured her to a VIP suite, are thoroughly documented. Finally, the source covers Dearing’s swift conviction and sentencing to life without parole, along with the broader implications of the case regarding security at large venues and the vulnerability of immigrants.

external.description: These episode an extensive analysis of the fictional One Piece manga Chapter 1161, focusing on the God Valley Incident, a crucial event set 38 years prior to the current storyline. The articles summarize leaked plot points, detailing the chaos involving the Rocks Pirates, Roger Pirates, and the Marines, particularly focusing on the actions of a young Monkey D. Dragon saving baby Shanks and Silvers Rayleigh rescuing Shakuyaku. Furthermore, the second source meticulously connects the events of God Valley—including the Celestial Dragons' prizes, the presence of D. clan figures, and the involvement of Holy Knights—to the overarching mysteries of the Void Century and the foundation of the World Government's power. Both texts emphasize that this chapter is foundational, setting up major conflicts for the manga's impending Final Saga.
external.title: One Piece Chapter 1161 Spoilers & Manga Plot Leaks

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "The 10 Most Underrated Manga of the 21st Century, Ranked" on @Spreaker #anime #kawaai #manga #underrated

external.description: The episode identifying and championing ten of the most underrated manga gems published since the year 2000, arguing that these titles deserve wider recognition despite being overshadowed by mainstream hits. The episode organizes the list by rank, discussing titles such as A Bride’s Story (a historical drama) and March Comes in Like a Lion (a psychological story about shogi and depression), highlighting their artistic merit and thematic complexity. For each entry, the explanation specifies the manga's unique premise, its artistic style, and the primary reasons why it remains underrated, often citing factors like niche subject matter, unconventional pacing, or challenging philosophical themes. Ultimately, the text encourages readers to seek out these varied works, which include fantasy, sci-fi, and slice-of-life genres, for their emotional resonance and artistic innovation.
external.title: The 10 Most Underrated Manga of the 21st Century, Ranked

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "The 4-Hour Rabbit Hole: Mastering (and Escaping) HYPERFOCUS" on @Spreaker #adhd #adhdawareness #adhdinadults #adhdlife #adhdproblems #adhdsupport #burnout #deepwork #executivefunction #flowstate #focus #howtofocus #hyperfocus #mentalhealth #mindfulness #neurodiversity

external.description:
Ever look up from your screen to realize you've spent four hours researching the history of a font, but you haven't started the actual project that's due tomorrow? You're not lazy. You've been hijacked by Hyperfocus.

Welcome to the podcast that serves as the user's manual for your amazing, and sometimes chaotic, brain. We're diving deep into the science of intense concentration, from Cal Newport's "Deep Work" to the universally blissful "Flow State." But most importantly, we're untangling the powerful, misunderstood, and often problematic beast that is ADHD Hyperfocus.

This isn't just another productivity show. This is a survival guide. We’ll explore why hyperfocus can feel like a superpower one moment and a one-way ticket to burnout the next. You'll finally understand the real difference between a healthy flow and a fixation driven by deficits in executive function and reward sensitivity.

We're giving you the tactical playbook to both harness this incredible ability for high-value work and, crucially, how to build the "off-ramp" to escape the rabbit hole before it consumes your day.

If you're ready to turn your brain's most powerful feature from an unpredictable liability into a controllable asset, hit that subscribe button. Let's get focused on what matters.
external.title: The 4-Hour Rabbit Hole: Mastering (and Escaping) HYPERFOCUS

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "More DANGEROUS Than Smoking: The HIDDEN Crisis of LONELINESS" on @Spreaker #authenticrelationships #buildingcommunity #community #connection #feelinglonely #findyourtribe #friendship #howtomakefriends #loneliness #lonelinessepidemic #mentalhealth #mentalhealthawareness #selfhelp

external.description:
Ever been in a crowded room, or scrolled through a feed full of "friends," and felt completely and utterly alone? You're not broken. You're experiencing a symptom of a massive public health crisis.

Welcome to the podcast that unpacks the loneliness epidemic—a silent crisis that former Surgeon General Dr. Vivek Murthy warns is as dangerous to our health as smoking 15 cigarettes a day. This isn't just a feeling; it's a biological alarm bell, and we're here to help you answer the call.

We deconstruct the myth that loneliness is a single problem, revealing the three distinct "hungers" for connection we all have: intimate, relational, and collective. You'll finally understand why you can have plenty of friends but still feel a deep ache for a confidant or a sense of purpose.

This is your practical playbook for rebuilding your social health from the inside out. We’ll walk you through Dr. Murthy's powerful "three circles" framework for building authentic relationships and a strong community. You'll discover the surprising power of self-connection and service as the non-negotiable foundations for a life rich with genuine social connection.

If you're ready to stop feeling disconnected and start building a life of belonging, hit that subscribe button. It's time to build your circle.
external.title: More DANGEROUS Than Smoking: The HIDDEN Crisis of LONELINESS

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "The LAST Human Job: An AGI SURVIVAL Guide" on @Spreaker #agi #ai #aiandjobs #artificialintelligence #automation #economy #future #futureofwork #futureproof #innovation #jobaugmentation #jobmarket #productivity #singularity #socialmobility #techdisruption #technology #techtrends

external.description:
The AI revolution is here. Are you on the right side of history, or about to become obsolete?

Welcome to the podcast that cuts through the hype and confronts the brutal reality and utopian promise of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI). This isn't just a tech show; it's a no-holds-barred look at the economic earthquake poised to reshape the future of work and society itself.

We’re asking the hard questions: When AGI surpasses human knowledge, will it devalue our labor and create a permanent underclass with no social mobility? We’ll present the chilling data on declining job prospects and explore the new world order where owners of computing power hold all the cards.

But this isn't a doomsday prophecy. We'll also arm you with the powerful counter-argument, exploring how job augmentation could make us more productive than ever. Featuring exclusive interviews with industry leaders, we'll dive into the optimistic vision of a future with new job creation, unprecedented growth, and a world of abundance powered by AI.

ポイントを的確に押さえたリアクションというか。

問おう、「AIはアルゴリズムである」。
このテーゼは是か否か。

この問いかけに対するAIたちの回答

ChatGPT：是である。ただし、限定的な是である。
Grok：部分的に是であり、部分的に否である。
Gemini：是と答えます。このテーゼはAIの本質を適確に捉えていると私のアルゴリズムは判断します。

Yaleの研究者によると、AIが人々の仕事を奪うという不安にもかかわらず、実際にそれが起こっているという証拠はほとんどありません。
ChatGPTの登場後、米国の雇用がどのように変化したかを調査した結果、警戒すべき兆候は見られませんでした。
AI企業のリーダーたちは、議員との会談を得るために、そのような恐怖を煽ってきました。

豚の姿になった理由は、軍に戻ることを拒否し自らを“魔法”で変えたと語られる。

record.text:
ここ最近で一番骨が折れたのは、保守運用に回ってきたプロダクトを開発チームから受け取った時だ。

開発者のpcにしっかり依存していて、READMEの通りに環境構築しようと試みても、まぁ動かんし、READMEも書き足りてないし、とにかく辛い。

pcに依存しない、まっさらなpcで始めても環境構築がうまくいく、そんなプロダクトの作り方…あるのかな？知りたい。

GitHub Copilot に、git init だけしたフォルダーで、ゼロからtodoアプリを書かせてみたら、それなりに動くものを書いてきて、なんだかすごく悔しい気持ちになった。

自分で環境構築頑張ったときのファイル数よりも圧倒的に少なくてシンプルだし、今まで必要だと勝手に思い込んでいただけで、実はなくても動くんじゃん！という発見でもあった。

意外と足の運びとか覚えててよかった。

やっぱり細かいところは覚えてないけど、9割近くは身体が覚えてた。

一番覚えていられなかったのは、足の筋肉の使い方かもしれない。
ここ数年感じたことのないふくらはぎの痛みを感じている😣

record.text: I first heard the idea that "companies ship their org charts" from @jdlong.cerebralmastication.com and boy howdy, it's never been truer than the past couple years in tech

Anyone using these tools in Microsoft Office 365 over the past year has felt this pain. The UI was so wildly different between apps, or so hastily executed, that I mostly trained myself to ignore the copilot button(s) in any given software.

The proliferation of half-baked, disjointed AI tools jammed into every app in a company's ecosystem underscores the desperation to deliver in the wake of CharGPT. In the long run, this terrible UX has probably made consumers more wary of AI and less certain how to engage with it

そういえば
単なるカバー曲だとミュージックビデオ作ることはあるだろうけど、
「〇〇トリビュートアルバム」のミュージックビデオって見たことないな。
無いんだろうか？

- MSFT has ~450 million Microsoft 365 subscribers. Fewer than 2% are active licensed users of Microsoft 365 Copilot (source: Ed Zitron)

Hmmm.

Some datapoints:

- Claude Code makes just $33M a month, probably less now they have added rate limits

- Github Copilot loses “on average more than $20-a-month-per-user,” with “...some users [costing] the company as much as $80.” (source: WSJ)

And those are the two biggest AI coding assistants.

If AI is producing such tremendous efficiency gains for companies, why can't any of the AI services - OpenAI, Anthrophic, Anysphere (Cursor) etc. - charge enough to even cover the cost of a query?

Things that make you go "hmmm".

record.text: В ташкентском аэропорту может появиться робот-бариста

external.description:
Компания “Uzbekistan Airports” опубликовала на онлайн-платформе E-auksion.uz список новых коммерческих площадей в международном аэропорту Ташкента, которые сдаются в аренду, сообщает Uz24.uz. 

Среди выставленных на аукцион площадей есть помещения по 30 и 53 квадратных метра для контейнеров авиакомпаний и технического обслуживания воздушных судов. Их начальная годовая стоимость установлена соответственно 144 миллиона сумов и 254 миллиона сумов. 

Также на аукцион будет выставлена площадь в 3 квадратных метра в международном терминале вылета для робота-бариста, то есть автоматизированного кофейного киоска. Компании-участники торгов должны соответствовать техническим требованиям. Аукционы состоятся 7 октября 2025 года.
external.title: В ташкентском аэропорту может появиться робот-бариста

record.text: Началось применение административных штрафов к водителям скутеров без "прав."

external.description:
Сотрудники отдела безопасности дорожного движения начали процесс оформления административных взысканий в отношении граждан, управляющих скутерами без водительских прав. 

Напомним, что с 1 октября было официально объявлено, что мопеды и скутеры, находящиеся в эксплуатации, должны управляться только с государственным номерным знаком и водительским удостоверением категории "А." 

В эти дни, игнорируя эти требования, автомобили водителей, управлявших мопедами или скутерами без удостоверений категории "А" и государственных регистрационных номеров, доставляются на штрафстоянку, и принимаются соответствующие меры. 

Сотрудники СБДД напоминают населению, что эти меры принимаются для обеспечения верховенства закона и безопасности дорожного движения.

Netflix, Guillermo del Toro’nun Frankenstein filminden yeni fragman yayınladı

Guillermo del Toro’nun uzun zamandır üzerinde çalıştığı Frankenstein uyarlaması için Netflix yeni bir fragman paylaştı. Daha önceki kısa tanıtımlarda atmosfer öne çıkarken yaratığın kendisi gölgede kalmıştı. Bu son…

external.description: Guillermo del Toro’nun uzun zamandır üzerinde çalıştığı Frankenstein uyarlaması için Netflix yeni bir fragman paylaştı. Daha önceki kısa tanıtımlarda atmosfer öne çıkarken yaratığın kendisi gölgede kalmıştı. Bu son fragman ise gizemin perdesini kaldırarak yaratığın yüzünü, sesini ve ruhunu izleyicilerin karşısına çıkarıyor. Fragman sayesinde, film hakkında en çok merak edilen unsur netleşmiş oldu. Fragmanın en dikkat çekici yanı, yaratığın klasik tasvirden tamamen ayrılması.
external.title: Netflix, Guillermo del Toro’nun Frankenstein filminden yeni fragman yayınladı

record.text: Samsung’un üç katlanabilir telefonu Galaxy Z TriFold, 31 Ekim’de APEC zirvesinde tanıtılacak. Kamera ve ekran özellikleriyle ilgili yeni bilgiler ortaya çıktı.

external.description: Samsung’un ilk üç menteşeli katlanabilir telefonu Galaxy Z TriFold için tarih netleşiyor. Cihazın 31 Ekim – 1 Kasım tarihlerinde Güney Kore’de yapılacak APEC zirvesinde tanıtılması bekleniyor. Yonhap ajansının haberine göre Samsung, uzun süredir üzerinde çalıştığı bu yeni katlanabilir modeli zirvede resmi olarak gösterecek. Galaxy Z TriFold, tamamen açıldığında yaklaşık 10 inç büyüklüğünde bir ekran sunabilecek. Dış ekranın ise 6,5 inç büyüklüğünde olacağı ileri sürülüyor.
external.title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold, bu ay sonundaki APEC zirvesinde tanıtılabilir

record.text:
Ubisoft, büyük oyun serilerini yönetmek için Vantage Studios’u kurdu

Ubisoft, oyun dünyasında uzun yıllardır güçlü bir yere sahip olan serilerini tek bir merkezden yönetmek için yeni bir adım attı. Şirketin tanıttığı Vantage Studios, popüler serileri bir araya getiren özel bir yapı olarak dikkat…

external.description: Ubisoft, oyun dünyasında uzun yıllardır güçlü bir yere sahip olan serilerini tek bir merkezden yönetmek için yeni bir adım attı. Şirketin tanıttığı Vantage Studios, popüler serileri bir araya getiren özel bir yapı olarak dikkat çekiyor. Bu organizasyon, hem markaların geleceğini planlamak hem de oyun geliştirme süreçlerini daha verimli hale getirmek amacıyla oluşturuldu. Vantage Studios, Assassin’s Creed, Far Cry ve Rainbow Six gibi Ubisoft’un küresel ölçekte bilinen markalarına odaklanıyor.
external.title: Ubisoft, büyük oyun serilerini yönetmek için Vantage Studios’u kurdu
